title: Game Crases with inactivity and randomly and Boards a profile picture bugged.
body:
1. My client seems to freeze and I cannot do anything for anywhere between 5- 1 min. It really disrupts the flow of the client and is really annoying when it is happening every few seconds. I've tried a repair of the client and a re-install however neither worked.

2. My boards profile picture doesn't update when I change my summoner icon in the game client. Currently I have the Cloud9 LCS summoner icon (although I want the Fnatic one) but for some reason the PROJECT: Lucian summoner icon shows up on the boards which is the one I had previously. It's been like this for 3 weeks and it's starting to get annoying.

replies.body:
Hey there,

1) When you say your client is "Freezing" for a period of time, do you mean in-game or are you referring to the actual pvp.net client?

2) Would you look at that, it seems your summoner icon has updated :) Did you ever end up submitting that ticket [I suggested](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/26yUZRvT-profile-picture-on-boards-profile-bugged?comment=000000000000) in your other thread?

Time to spice things up

2. Yea it just seemed to update for some weird reason. Although now it's fixed which is good :)

1. I mean the actual pvp.net client is freezing for up to 3 mins
That sounds odd, are you running any other applications that could be eating up system resources when your client freezes?

No, just the pvp.client and sometimes Skype or google chrome which I usually close soon as I just want to find something out. I don't use Skype much either and it freezes longer with Skype up which makes sense. But yea, just the pvp.net client is up when I'm using it.

>it freezes longer with Skype up which makes sense

What are your system specs?

Processor: AMD A6 4600  2.7Ghz
RAM: 4.00 GB (3.47 usable)
OS: Windows - Windows 10
Local Disk Space Free: 308 GB

Don't know what else you would want so let me know if you need anything else.

If your client freezes for longer periods of time with skype up, I'd chock it up to you running low on system memory (4GB is pretty low, especially if there are other services running in the background)

Open up task manager, go to your process details list and sort by RAM usage, determine what's eating the most memory while you're at "idle" and close it if it's a non-essential.

Can't find the sort by RAM feature. All I see is CPU, Memory, Disk and Network.

P.S The pvp.net client freezes even with Skype not running just not as long.

I found that 3 things were trading a fair bit of RAM. 1. System and Compressed Memory - 94.8MB. Don't know if you should end this task or not. Sounds kinda important. 2. Service Host: Local System. 71.0 MB. Also sounds pretty important so I haven't ended the task. 3 an iCloud update service which I ended as I don't use iCloud on the PC. Also the LoL client.exe program while running is somewhere around 467.9 MB of memory.  It's highlighted in a darker shade of yellow, almost like an orange.
And if you click on the performance tab in task manager, how much of your total RAM is being consumed? (Without running league)
